TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo

summary.span: 表示已驗證之 XML 節點的後結構描述驗證資訊集。

span.span: Represents the post-schema-validation infoset of a validated XML node.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 此範例使用 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 類別的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述驗證期間，是否要將這個已驗證的 XML 節點設為套用之預設值的結果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating if this validated XML node was set as the result of a default being applied during XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不會報告 DTD 預設值。The property does not report DTD defaults.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出這個已驗證之 XML 節點的值是否為 nil。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating if the value for this validated XML node is nil.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 節點的值為 nil 如果其`xsi:nil`屬性是`true`。The value of an XML node is nil if its `xsi:nil` attribute is `true`.

summary.span: 取得或設定這個已驗證之 XML 節點的動態結構描述型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the dynamic schema type for this validated XML node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定的 XML 節點的靜態型別是等位型別在此情況下，才屬性將傳回類型的聯集針對所驗證之 XML 節點。The property is set only if the static type of the XML node is a union type in which case the property will return the type from the union the XML node validated against.

summary.span: 取得或設定這個已驗證之 XML 節點的靜態 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the static XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema type of this validated XML node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態類型的 XML 節點是在 XSD 結構描述中宣告的型別。The static type of an XML node is the type that was declared in the XSD schema. ## Examples 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 此範例使用 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 類別的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input.
